title: Side Effects of Being a Reformed Racist (with Daniel Collins)
description:
This week, we talk to Daniel Collins, former convict and current activist, about his road to enlightenment and his fight for RaShawn Clark’s freedom.
https://www.gofundme.com/f/attorney-retention-for-rashawn-clark
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
Get started with Issuu today for FREE or if you sign up for a premium account you will get 50% off when you go to ISSUU.com/podcast and use promo code DOSES
There is a detective in all of us! Find your inner detective -- Download June’s Journey free today on the Apple App Store or Google Play! 
Trust me, you need to start taking the breaks you deserve with Jinjer Essential Oil too. And right now, I have an amazing deal just for my listeners: 20% OFF your first purchase. But this is only available at my special URL jinjer.US/DOSES
